_MaxPathLength_help: Maximum allowed path length before creating short links. Windows limit is typically 260 characters.
_ShortLinkRoot_help: Root directory where short links will be created. Must be accessible and have sufficient permissions.
_DatabasePath_help: Path to SQLite database for tracking operations. Relative paths are relative to script location.
_LinkType_help: Preferred link type: Auto, Junction, SymbolicLink, HardLink. Auto selects optimal type based on content.
_LogLevel_help: Logging level: Debug, Info, Warning, Error. Debug provides most verbose output.
_HashLength_help: Length of hash suffix used in short names. Longer hashes reduce collisions but create longer names.
_PrefixLength_help: Maximum length of original name prefix used in short names. Helps with human readability.
_ExcludePatterns_help: File/directory patterns to exclude from processing. Uses PowerShell wildcards.
_LinkPreferences_help: Preferred link types for different scenarios when LinkType is Auto.
_BackupEnabled_help: Whether to create backup records in database before operations. Enables rollback functionality.
_MaxOperationsPerBatch_help: Maximum number of operations to process in a single batch to manage memory usage.

AdvancedSettings._UseTransactions_help: Use database transactions for atomic operations. Recommended for data integrity.
AdvancedSettings._ValidateLinksAfterCreation_help: Verify that created links are functional before marking operation as successful.
AdvancedSettings._CleanupOrphanedLinks_help: Automatically remove links that point to non-existent targets during operations.
AdvancedSettings._ProgressUpdateInterval_help: Update progress display every N operations during batch processing.
AdvancedSettings._MaxRetryAttempts_help: Number of times to retry failed operations before giving up.
AdvancedSettings._RetryDelaySeconds_help: Seconds to wait between retry attempts for failed operations.

SecuritySettings._RequireElevation_help: Require administrator privileges to run the script. Some link types may need elevation.
SecuritySettings._AllowCrossVolumeLinks_help: Allow creation of links that cross volume boundaries. May have performance implications.
SecuritySettings._ValidateTargetAccessibility_help: Verify that target directories are accessible before creating links.

PerformanceSettings._UseParallelProcessing_help: Use multiple threads for path scanning. May improve performance on large directories.
PerformanceSettings._MaxParallelJobs_help: Maximum number of parallel jobs when UseParallelProcessing is enabled.
PerformanceSettings._CachePathAnalysis_help: Cache path analysis results to avoid re-scanning unchanged directories.
PerformanceSettings._CacheExpirationHours_help: Hours after which cached analysis results expire and require re-scanning.

NotificationSettings._ShowProgressBar_help: Display progress bars during long-running operations.
NotificationSettings._VerboseOutput_help: Show detailed output for each operation. Useful for troubleshooting.
NotificationSettings._SummaryReport_help: Display summary report after operations complete.
NotificationSettings._ErrorNotificationLevel_help: Minimum error level to display notifications: Debug, Info, Warning, Error.
